title: "London Regtech ComplyAdvantage Receives $20M from Goldman Sachs, Part of its $70M Series C Extension"
excerpt: "ComplyAdvantage, an AI-enhanced financial crime detection firm, has extended its Series C funding round to $70 million, with an additional $20 million from Goldman Sachs. ComplyAdvantage ‘s investment has reportedly come on top of the firm’s oversubscribed Series C round that was announced in July of last year."
